auth.rpmtw_platform_mod.title: RPMTW Account
auth.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.failed:
Login failed, please try again!
If it still fails, please go to RPMTW Discord and ask
https://discord.gg/5xApZtgV2u
auth.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.success: Login successfully, you can now close this page, go back to the game and enjoy the game!
command.rpmtw_platform_mod.universeChatA: Failed to got the universe chat message.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.univers: Minecraft account is used by default if you are not logged in to your RPMTW account
If disabled, it will override and disable other universe chat options.
Whether to show shortcut button of universe chat in the chat screen.
The nickname of the player in universe chat.
Messages from these users will be blocked.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.keyBind: Update the translate resource pack to date, then reload it.
Open the translation of your main hand item or that you are looking at a block or entity on Crowdin.
Before using this function, please hold an item or look at any block or entity.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.transla: Auto Translate the name and description of the item by machine in background.
Machine translation is used to translate text if human translation is not available.
Additional display of unlocalized content, not work if the game language is American English.
Load the translate resource pack to translate the mods and other contents, not work by default if the game language is American English.
Automatically switch the game language to the OS country/region language.
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.option.advance: Send the mod exceptions to Sentry
Send the mod exceptions to Sentry to help us improve the mod. (All data will be de-identified and we will not use it for other purposes.)
config.rpmtw_platform_mod.title: RPMTW Platform Config
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.button.s: Sending messages to the vastness of the universe.
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.gui.eula: By using the universe chat system, you agree to the following terms.
- This feature is integrated into Discord, so please follow the Discord User Terms of Service.
- You are not allowed to use any form of harassment in the message, or use any means to attack the universe chat server.
- We will collect your UUID/IP for verification and ban account purposes only.
- We may change these terms and conditions at any time (to view the latest version, please go to the RPMTW official website).
《RPMTW Universe chat system end-user license agreement》
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.gui.send: Send message to universe chat system
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.b: No message can be sent because your IP has been banned.
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.p: The message cannot be sent because the system detects that the message contains a suspicious link.
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.status.u: The message cannot be sent, probably because it is a pirated account or the certificate data is processed incorrectly, please try again.
universeChat.rpmtw_platform_mod.title: Universe Chat
machineTranslation.rpmtw_platform_mod.st: Exception error occurred, status code: %d, please try again later.
The connection to Google Translate Server has exceeded the rate limit (429), please try again later.
